definition: A predatory animal, typically used to refer to a wide range of carnivorous creatures in the animal kingdom. This term is commonly employed to describe animals that hunt and feed on other animals for survival.

examples.german: Raubtiere sind wichtige Bestandteile des Ökosystems.
examples.english: Predators are important components of the ecosystem.

examples.german: Das Raubtier schleicht sich lautlos an.
